text: Ni shuo:“Jiaru nimen de fuqin, erzi, xiongdi, qizi, qinqi, nimen suo zhuan qu de caifu, nimen haipa diejia de maoyi he nimen suo xihuan de zhuzhai, dui nimen lai shuo bi an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng] he wei an la zhi dao fendou [zhu] zhe geng ke'ai, name, nimen dengdai ba! Zhidao an la zhixing ta de mingling. An la jue bu yindao beini de minzhong.”
